tuc.ece.cs202.project3

Class HashBucket

  • java.lang.Object
    • tuc.ece.cs202.project3.HashBucket

  • class HashBucket
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the "bucket" of the Linear Hashing data structure
    Author:
    Spyros Argyropoulos, Stefanos Karasavvidis, Georgios Frangias

        Parameters:
        lh - the Linear Hashing data structure
        n - the number used in the modulo calculation

        newBucket - the new bucket where some of the keys will be moved
